thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: A. Tucker
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by A. Tucker

author: A. Tucker
title: A. Tucker
text: After comparing pet insurance companies and other policies offered, I was thrilled to find Figo. I love that you can customize your plan in order to have an affordable premium, and the coverage is superior to other plans out there. The customer service representative was very helpful and took time to thoroughly answer all my questions. It's so good to know that my two little dogs now have insurance coverage as they get older.
